languages.text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.
languages.original_text: При успешном {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} этим мечом цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −5 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, а {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} увеличивается на +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Убеждение{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g}: персонаж восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное 25% от {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, нанесенного цели, получившей кровотечение.

traits.locale_text: When this sword hits an enemy and that enemy fails a Toughness resistance test, it inflicts bleeding (4 damage at the start of each turn) on that enemy and increases the veil degradation by +1. Conviction — Hereticus: +2 damage for every bleeding enemy in combat. Other convictions: +1 damage for every bleeding enemy in combat.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance test with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effect{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. Conviction — Hereticus: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the damage dealt to the bleeding target.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

languages.text: При успешном {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} этим мечом цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −5 и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, а {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} увеличивается на +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Убеждение{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g}: персонаж восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное 25% от {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, нанесенного цели, получившей кровотечение.
languages.original_text: When this sword hits an enemy and that enemy fails a Toughness Test, it inflicts the bleeding effect on that enemy and increases the veil degradation by +1. Conviction: Hereticus: +2 damage for every bleeding enemy in combat. Other Convictions: +1 damage for every bleeding enemy in combat. +10% parry −10 enemy's Weapon Skill when the attack hits (does not stack)

languages.text: Wenn dieses Schwert ein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} und dieses eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −5 nicht schafft, fügt es diesem Ziel den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} zu und erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} um +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugung{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g}: Stellt {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe von 25 % des verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} gegen ein blutendes Ziel wieder her.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

traits.locale_text: [Entwurf] Wenn dieses Schwert einen Gegner trifft und dieser eine Zähigkeitsprobe (Schwierigkeit -5) nicht schafft, fügt es diesem Gegner den Effekt Blutung zu und erhöht den Schleier-Zerfall um +1. Überzeugung – Haereticus: Stellt Wunden in Höhe von 25% des verursachten Schadens gegen ein blutendes Ziel wieder her.

languages.text: Toute cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} par cette épée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −5. Si elle échoue, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} est augmentée de +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} : l'utilisateur récupère un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} égal à 25 % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés à la cible affectée par l'effet Saignement.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

traits.locale_text: [brouillon] Lorsque cette épée touche un ennemi et que celui-ci échoue à un test de Résistance (diff -5), elle lui inflige l'effet Saignement et augmente la dégradation du voile de +1. Conviction — Hereticus : rétablit un nombre de blessures égal à 25 % des dégâts infligés à la cible frappée par l'effet de Saignement.

languages.text: 成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标后，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-5减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态，且{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度提高1点。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}——{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}：装备者攻击流血的目标时会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的25%。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

traits.locale_text: 这把剑{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，若目标敌人未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则对敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，还会使{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度提高1点。 信念：异端主义：战斗中每有一名流血的敌人，造成的伤害提高2点。 其他信念：战斗中每有一名流血的敌人，造成的伤害提高1点。

成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标后，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态，且{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度提高1点。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}——{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}：装备者攻击流血的目标时会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的25%。

languages.original_text: When this sword hits an enemy and that enemy fails a Toughness Test, it inflicts the bleeding effect on that enemy and increases the veil degradation by +1. Conviction: Hereticus: +2 damage for every bleeding enemy in combat. Other convictions: +1 damage for every bleeding enemy in combat.

languages.text: Cuando esta espada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −5. Si falla, le inflige el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Convicción{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: el portador recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 25 % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido al objetivo con hemorragia.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta espada {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo y dicho enemigo no supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, le inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en +1. Convicción: Hereticus: +2 de daño por cada enemigo con hemorragia en el combate. Otras convicciones: +1 de daño por cada enemigo con hemorragia en el combate.

languages.text: この剣の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃に当たった{/g}ターゲットは、−5のペナルティがある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果を受けて、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が1増加する。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g}：武器の持ち主は、出血中のターゲットに与えた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の25%分、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}を回復する。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

traits.locale_text: この剣が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}し、その敵が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗すると、敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}が発動し{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が1増加する。 信念：異端者：戦闘中の出血している敵1体につき+2ダメージ。 その他の信念：戦闘中の出血している敵1体につき+1ダメージ。

この剣の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃に当たった{/g}ターゲットは、−5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果を受けて、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が1増加する。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g}：武器の持ち主は、出血中のターゲットに与えた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の25%分、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}を回復する。

languages.text: Bu kılıçla yapılan başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşta{/g} hedef, −5 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Hedef, testi geçemezse {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulması{/g} +1 artar. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Kanaat{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g}: Kullanan kişi, kan kaybeden hedefe verilen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} %25'i kadar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazeler.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.
